tool_description: Aspose.Words Cloud is a REST API to create, manipulate, convert and render Word documents in the cloud by performing a wide variety of document operations you can wish to perform on a document in the cloud.
name: Aspose.Words Cloud
title: Aspose.Words Cloud

api_list.name: InsertField
api_list.description: Adds field to document, returns inserted field's data.

required_parameters.name: nodePath
required_parameters.description: Path to the node, which contains collection of fields.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

optional_parameters.name: insertBeforeNode
optional_parameters.description: Field will be inserted before node with id="nodeId".

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.name: revisionDateTime
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: revisionAuthor
optional_parameters.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.If you set this parameter and then make some changes to the document programmatically, save the document and later open the document in MS Word you will see these changes as revisions.

api_list.name: InsertFootnote
api_list.description: Adds footnote to document, returns added footnote's data.

required_parameters.name: nodePath
required_parameters.description: Path to the node, which contains collection of footnotes.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

optional_parameters.name: revisionDateTime
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

optional_parameters.name: revisionAuthor
optional_parameters.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.If you set this parameter and then make some changes to the document programmatically, save the document and later open the document in MS Word you will see these changes as revisions.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

api_list.name: InsertParagraph
api_list.description: Adds paragraph to document, returns added paragraph's data.

required_parameters.name: nodePath
required_parameters.description: Path to the node which contains paragraphs.

optional_parameters.name: Text
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets paragraph's text.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.name: revisionDateTime
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

optional_parameters.name: revisionAuthor
optional_parameters.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.If you set this parameter and then make some changes to the document programmatically, save the document and later open the document in MS Word you will see these changes as revisions.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: insertBeforeNode
optional_parameters.description: Paragraph will be inserted before node with index.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

api_list.name: InsertFormField
api_list.description: Adds form field to paragraph, returns added form field's data.

required_parameters.name: nodePath
required_parameters.description: Path to the node that contains collection of formfields.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: insertBeforeNode
optional_parameters.description: Form field will be inserted before node with index.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: revisionDateTime
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.name: revisionAuthor
optional_parameters.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.If you set this parameter and then make some changes to the document programmatically, save the document and later open the document in MS Word you will see these changes as revisions.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

api_list.name: ReplaceWithText
api_list.description: Replaces the content in the range.

required_parameters.name: rangeStartIdentifier
required_parameters.description:
The range start identifier.
Identifier is the value of the "nodeId" field, which every document node has, extended with the prefix "id".
It looks like "id0.7". Also values like "image5" and "table3" can be used as an identifier for images and tables, where the number is an index of the image/table.

optional_parameters.name: Text
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets range's text.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

api_list.name: InsertTable
api_list.description: Adds table to document, returns added table's data.

required_parameters.name: nodePath
required_parameters.description: Path to the node, which contains tables.

optional_parameters.name: RowsCount
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets count of rows. Default is 2.

optional_parameters.name: Position
optional_parameters.description: Represents a position in the document tree.

optional_parameters.name: ColumnsCount
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets count of columns. Default is 2.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: revisionDateTime
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.name: revisionAuthor
optional_parameters.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.If you set this parameter and then make some changes to the document programmatically, save the document and later open the document in MS Word you will see these changes as revisions.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

api_list.name: InsertWatermarkImage
api_list.description: Inserts document watermark image.

optional_parameters.name: imageFile
optional_parameters.description: File with image

optional_parameters.name: revisionAuthor
optional_parameters.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.If you set this parameter and then make some changes to the document programmatically, save the document and later open the document in MS Word you will see these changes as revisions.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.name: destFileName
optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image file server full name. If the name is empty the image is expected in request content.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: revisionDateTime
optional_parameters.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

optional_parameters.name: rotationAngle
optional_parameters.description: The watermark rotation angle.

api_list.name: SaveAsRange
api_list.description: Saves the selected range as a new document.

required_parameters.name: rangeStartIdentifier
required_parameters.description:
The range start identifier.
Identifier is the value of the "nodeId" field, which every document node has, extended with the prefix "id".
It looks like "id0.7". Also values like "image5" and "table3" can be used as an identifier for images and tables, where the number is an index of the image/table.

optional_parameters.name: DocumentName
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets name for new document.

optional_parameters.name: loadEncoding
optional_parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

optional_parameters.description: Original document folder.

optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

optional_parameters.name: ColumnsCount
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets count of columns. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: InsertAfter
optional_parameters.description: Gets or sets table row will be inserted after row with specified 0-based index.

optional_parameters.description: Result path of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

optional_parameters.description: Original document storage.
